chapters.title: ■ Added Liquify Tool
chapters.body: Added a liquify tool that lets you transform layers by dragging across them. It supports Push, Scale, Rotate, and Reset modes. If you're using Apple Pencil Pro, you can also control rotation by rolling the pencil in Push mode. Use the Softness parameter to adjust the smoothness of transformation edges and the Strength parameter to adjust the amount of deformation.

chapters.title: ■ PSD File Export Support
chapters.body: You can now select PSD from the export menu. Edit the file in other tools while preserving the layer structure.

chapters.title: ■ PSD File Import Support
chapters.body: You can now import and edit PSD files from the Files app or camera roll. Select Micapaint from the share destination in the File menu.

chapters.title: ■ iPadOS 26 Design Support
chapters.body: Tool UI now supports iPadOS 26 design. Fixed UI issues such as the back to gallery button being hidden by window controls.

chapters.title: ■ Improved Stability
chapters.body:
・Fixed an issue where the topmost item was always deleted when pressing the localization delete button for brush names
・Fixed layout corruption when reducing sidebar width
・Additional bug fixes

chapters.title: ■ Fixed an issue where image importing failed
chapters.body: Fixed an issue in v1.3.0 where importing an image into a layer caused an error.

chapters.title: ■ Explicitly Save Canvas
chapters.body: Added an option to save without returning when pressing the back to gallery button. When you turn ON "Always Save and Back to Gallery", it behaves like before.

chapters.title: ■ Layer Rotation & Flip Features
chapters.body: Added buttons to rotate and flip layers in the Transform tool's operation panel.

chapters.title: ■ Improved Stability
chapters.body:
・Fixed canvas not being saved when returning to gallery page during filter editing
・Fixed layer content corruption when performing other layer operations during filter editing
・Fixed alpha lock not working on slime brush
・Additional bug fixes

chapters.title: ■ Maintain Brightness While Adjusting Saturation
chapters.body: In the Hue / Saturation / Brightness filter, switching to Perceptual mode now lets you adjust saturation while keeping the original brightness.
chapters.imageCaption: Original / Perceptual Saturation -100 / Compatible Mode Saturation -100

chapters.title: ■ Create a Layer Merged from All Layers
chapters.body: Tap Add Merged Layer from the layer menu to insert a layer above the current one that contains a merge of all layers.

chapters.title: ■ Swipe Left on Layers to Delete
chapters.body: Swiping left on a layer or folder now reveals the Delete button.

chapters.title: ■ Show Tooltips
chapters.body: Hover Apple Pencil over a button to see a description (requires a device that supports hover).

chapters.title: ■ Improved Stability
chapters.body:
・Fixed hue values occasionally jumping in the color picker
・Undo / Redo availability now reflected in the button appearance
・Additional bug fixes
